name: Kiut - Cute live pet
description:
Can you take on the responsibility of properly caring for a delicate Kiut?

Who will take on the role to take care of Kiut? Feed, dress Kiut, play minigames and unlock talents and costumes, how are you going to dress Kiut?

You can win money for a variety of mini-games that can range from a purchase to a new dress, body, color, or mustache.

Feed and care for Kiut to get money! New experiments with dresses, sunglasses, cheeks, tattoos and mustaches, customize and unlock special items successfully!
